content: shell*t washcloth kayla chambers note to self block project before taking photos oops inspired by this amazing cursing cloth https //teeztopperz wordpress com/2018/04/03/the-cursing-cloth-crochet-pattern/ what i love about this washcloth is that it s not obvious what it says up close it s a perfect little inside joke guests ~probably~ won t notice but don t blame me if they do 4mm hook darning needle scissors 50 yards or so of cotton i used less than half a skein of hobby lobby s i love this cotton since this will be a fancy washcloth if using it for cleaning i recommend sugar and cream iltc doesn t hold up well to scrubbing give this tutorial a watch standing double_crochet makes for straight and even edges if you d rather not use it chain 3 instead and count it as your first stitch of the row https //www youtube com/watch v=vbp-bo2eqre us terms chain chain double_crochet double_crochet sdc standing double_crochet skip st skip stitch single_crochet single_crochet turn at the end of each row chain 35 row 1 double_crochet into 5th chain from the hook *chain 1 skip st double_crochet* repeat ** 33 row 2 sdc in first *chain 1 skip st double_crochet* repeat** 33 row 3-5 sdc in first double_crochet across 33 now the fun part row 6 sdc in first 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 1 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 6 double_crochet 33 row 7 sdc in first 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 8 double_crochet 33 row 8 sdc in first 7 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 6 double_crochet 33 row 9 sdc in first 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 1 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 1 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 8 double_crochet 33 row 10 sdc in first 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 6 double_crochet 33 row 11 sdc in first 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 7 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 4 double_crochet 33 row 12 sdc in first 5 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 1 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip st 3
